r.d: Parses Mediawiki mark-up to tokenize the text for Text_Wiki renderings. You can see a reference for this syntax here: http://meta.wikimedia.org/wiki/Help:Editing#The_wiki_markup
r.n:
This release has the following improvements:
* PHPUnit tests for Mediawiki parser * Support for heading with only one level (ie: =heading=) * Add parse for redirect rule * Fix bug #16455: proper parsing of bold and italic
